functions.name: loadAllocations
functions.description: Loads the current year's ledger and allotments. Returns derived state: available, coming_up, and unavailable.

functions.name: redeemAllocation
functions.description: Takes an item type (e.g. 'Caloric Beverage'), updates ledger with redemption, recalculates derived state.

functions.name: addAllocation
functions.description: Optional. Allows manual override to add back one allocation (useful for testing or corrections).

functions.name: getStats
functions.description: Returns analytics view: usage counts, reset schedule, and percentages used this year.

mvp_notes: Use stubbed data from allotments.json + ledger.jsonl. Persist locally for now. Later connect to n8n webhooks for real data writes.
